mapper.select: SELECT division_code AS divisionCode , dept_code AS deptCode , dept_name AS deptName FROM department WHERE division_code LIKE #{divisionCode}

SELECT DISTINCT e.emp_no AS empNo, e.emp_name AS empName, e.rank_no AS rankNo, r.rank_name AS rankName, e.dept_code AS deptCode, IFNULL(CONCAT(ef.file_name, ef.file_ext), 'placeholder.png') AS fileName, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY e.dept_code ORDER BY e.rank_no DESC) AS depth FROM employee e JOIN `rank` r ON e.rank_no = r.rank_no LEFT OUTER JOIN employee_file ef ON e.emp_no = ef.emp_no WHERE e.dept_code = #{deptCode} AND (ef.file_purpose = 'P' OR ef.file_purpose IS NULL) ORDER BY depth
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM department WHERE UPPER(REPLACE(dept_name, ' ', '')) = UPPER(REPLACE(#{deptName}, ' ', ''))
SELECT dept_code AS deptCode , dept_ext AS deptExt FROM department WHERE division_code = #{divisionCode} ORDER BY dept_code DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT dept_ext AS deptExt FROM department ORDER BY dept_ext DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department(dept_code, division_code, dept_name, dept_ext, create_datetime, update_datetime) VALUES(#{deptCode}, #{divisionCode}, #{deptName}, #{deptExt}, NOW(), NOW());
